title: (Thurs Full) The 2022 CMA Award Nominees + Ray and His Wife Won BIG In Vegas + Money Button Scenario: $1 Million vs. 50/50 Chance of Winning $50 Million
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) The 2022 CMA Award Nominees + Ray and His Wife Won BIG In Vegas + Money Button Scenario: $1 Million vs. 50/50 Chance of Winning $50 Million
description:
We go over the 2022 CMA Award Nominees and predict who we think will win! Ray and his wife won BIG in Vegas, so why are they hiding it from everyone? Money button scenario: You have two buttons in front of you. One gives you $1 Million dollars and the other gives you a 50/50 chance of getting $50MILLION, we find out what everyone would choose.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
